content: We'll be streaming talks with Zoom. This is some fancy technology that the conference room is wired for. As I understand it, you need to download the client atÂ https://zoom.us/download and then log into the right "meeting." We'll post meeting IDs here/on the website closer to the date.
We'll also record the streams and put them up on YouTube afterward.
If you're watching live and want to ask questions during the Q&As, we'll keep an eye on Zulip and the Zoom chat feature.
